properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 8:52AM PST until February 5 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...N winds 15 to 25 kt. A few gusts to 35 kt through this
evening. Seas 12 to 15 ft today subsiding to 10 to 12 ft
tonight and Tuesday.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 9 AM PST this morning. For
the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small crafts.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY
